page_content:
PROTECTING PEOPLE 
AND THE PLANET 
Amyris is on a mission to make sustainable 
consumerism mainstream. As leaders in the 
development of sustainable ingredients, we 
create naturally derived products to replace 
ingredients traditionally derived from 
finite sources, including animals, plants 
or petrochemicals, providing healthy and 
clean alternatives for the products people 
use every day. Amyris 2021 ESG Report
5PROTECTING PEOPLE AND THE PLANET MAKING LIFE BETTER OPERATING OUR BUSINESS RESPONSIBLY
